channel.title: Admin help!
channel.description: k so well i cant make myslef a admin on my server lolz. i go to characters, edit,save,compile then when i log on im not a admin and my rights get set back to 0 do you know whats wrong????????

item.title: Admin help!
item.dc:creator: @jonyo jonyo
item.description:
@jonyo wrote:

mr candy:

darn retard dont talk to me like you have a clue now i was gunna help you but go fuck yaself

dude shut up don’t be a jerk to him he’s asking a freaking question… ok dude what you do is go your characters folder and find your character name. Make sure your account is not logged into your server though. Open up the file and under the [CHARACTER] section there should be comething like this

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3254 character-posy = 3420 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = 0 character-lastlogin = 0 character-energy = 100 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 0

now under the

character-rights = 0

change the 0 to a 3. Save the file then log into your account… oh rofl I just realized. You probably are an admin but by default most servers do not have it so owners can see a gold crown. I can pretty much gaurentee you thats it if you’ve been doing it right. To make sure try out an admin only command such as ::pnpc 1

hope that helps good luck with your server

Read full topic
